author: Staff Reporter
text:
Representatives of various political parties on Monday gave a petition to Collector S. Jayandhi alleging that bogus voters had found place in the electoral list.

“About 2,000 people have got enrolled into the list without proper procedures been followed.

“An inquiry should be conducted and find out the truth as to who were behind the malpractice. The bogus voters have been found in corporation wards 52, 53 and 54”, said A. Govindaraj, the DMDK councillor in Tirupur Corporation council, who is one of the petitioners.

The members of CPI (M), CPI, DMDK, MDMK, Congress, BJP and few others signed the petition.
title: Plea to check bogus voters in Tirupur
